item.title: Using Blockdiag with Pelican and liquid tags
item.description: After writing the previous article I thought I should share some Blockdiag plugin for Pelican. You can also check out the pull request. blockdiag It’s basically a graphviz like utility with its own language (similar to DOT). You can create: block diagrams sequence diagrams activity diagrams network diagrams rack diagrams packet diagrams It can save you a lot of time and has a pretty simple syntax. You can always test your code online using blockdiag’s interactive shell.
